mapper.select: select * from accessory_material where MARK_STATUS ='1' AND ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT COUNT(0) FROM accessory_material where MARK_STATUS ='1' AND 1=1
AND ADD_DATE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{addDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (ADD_DATE ='' OR ADD_DATE IS NULL)
AND ADD_DATE !=''
AND WAVE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{wave,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (WAVE ='' OR WAVE IS NULL)
AND WAVE !=''
AND NUMBER_ORDER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{numberOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (NUMBER_ORDER ='' OR NUMBER_ORDER IS NULL)
AND NUMBER_ORDER !=''
AND ORDER_DETAILS LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderDetails,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (ORDER_DETAILS ='' OR ORDER_DETAILS IS NULL)
AND ORDER_DETAILS !=''
AND DESIGN_CHART LIKE CONCAT('%',#{designChart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (DESIGN_CHART ='' OR DESIGN_CHART IS NULL)
AND DESIGN_CHART !=''
AND CRAFTS_ORDER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{wave,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (CRAFTS_ORDER ='' OR CRAFTS_ORDER IS NULL)
AND CRAFTS_ORDER !=''
AND SIZE_CHART LIKE CONCAT('%',#{sizeChart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (SIZE_CHART ='' OR SIZE_CHART IS NULL)
AND WAVE !=''
AND EDITION_TYPE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{editionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (EDITION_TYPE ='' OR EDITION_TYPE IS NULL)
AND EDITION_TYPE !=''
AND CODE59 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{code59,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (CODE59 ='' OR CODE59 IS NULL)
AND CODE59 !=''
AND CODE66 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{code66,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (CODE66 ='' OR CODE66 IS NULL)
AND CODE66 !=''
AND CODE73 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{code73,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (CODE73 ='' OR CODE73 IS NULL)
AND CODE73 !=''
AND CODE80 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{code80,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (CODE80 ='' OR CODE80 IS NULL)
AND CODE80 !=''
AND CODE90 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{code90,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (CODE90 ='' OR CODE90 IS NULL)
AND CODE90 !=''
AND PACKING_BAG_QUANTITY LIKE CONCAT('%',#{packingBagQuantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND ( PACKING_BAG_QUANTITY ='' OR PACKING_BAG_QUANTITY IS NULL)
AND PACKING_BAG_QUANTITY !=''
AND PACKING_BAG_SPECIFICATION LIKE CONCAT('%',#{packingBagSpecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND ( PACKING_BAG_SPECIFICATION ='' OR PACKING_BAG_SPECIFICATION IS NULL)
AND PACKING_BAG_SPECIFICATION !=''
AND INGREDIENT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{ingredient,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (INGREDIENT ='' OR INGREDIENT IS NULL)
AND INGREDIENT !=''
AND POPPER_COLOR LIKE CONCAT('%',#{popperColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (POPPER_COLOR ='' OR POPPER_COLOR IS NULL)
AND POPPER_COLOR !=''
AND POPPER_QUANTITY LIKE CONCAT('%',#{popperQuantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (POPPER_QUANTITY ='' OR POPPER_QUANTITY IS NULL)
AND POPPER_QUANTITY !=''
AND ACCESSORIES_A LIKE CONCAT('%',#{accessoriesA,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (ACCESSORIES_A ='' OR ACCESSORIES_A IS NULL)
AND ACCESSORIES_A !=''
AND ACCESSORIES_A_QUANTITY LIKE CONCAT('%',#{accessoriesAQuantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (ACCESSORIES_A_QUANTITY ='' OR ACCESSORIES_A_QUANTITY IS NULL)
AND ACCESSORIES_A_QUANTITY !=''
AND ACCESSORIES_B LIKE CONCAT('%',#{accessoriesB,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (ACCESSORIES_B ='' OR ACCESSORIES_B IS NULL)
AND ACCESSORIES_B !=''
AND ACCESSORIES_B_QUANTITY LIKE CONCAT('%',#{accessoriesBQuantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (ACCESSORIES_B_QUANTITY ='' OR ACCESSORIES_B_QUANTITY IS NULL)
AND ACCESSORIES_B_QUANTITY !=''
AND ACCESSORIES_C LIKE CONCAT('%',#{accessoriesC,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (ACCESSORIES_C ='' OR ACCESSORIES_C IS NULL)
AND ACCESSORIES_C !=''
AND ACCESSORIES_C_QUANTITY LIKE CONCAT('%',#{accessoriesCQuantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (ACCESSORIES_C_QUANTITY ='' OR ACCESSORIES_C_QUANTITY IS NULL)
AND ACCESSORIES_C_QUANTITY !=''
AND REMARKS_RICHARD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{remarksRichard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (REMARKS_RICHARD ='' OR REMARKS_RICHARD IS NULL)
AND REMARKS_RICHARD !=''
AND REMARKS LIKE CONCAT('%',#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (REMARKS ='' OR REMARKS IS NULL)
AND REMARKS !=''
AND ISSUED_STATUS LIKE CONCAT('%',#{issuedStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (ISSUED_STATUS ='' OR ISSUED_STATUS IS NULL)
AND ISSUED_STATUS !=''
AND FOUNDER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{founder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (FOUNDER ='' OR FOUNDER IS NULL)
AND FOUNDER !=''

SELECT * FROM accessory_material WHERE MARK_STATUS = '1' AND 1 = 1
AND ADD_DATE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{addDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (ADD_DATE ='' OR ADD_DATE IS NULL)
AND ADD_DATE !=''
AND WAVE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{wave,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (WAVE ='' OR WAVE IS NULL)
AND WAVE !=''
AND NUMBER_ORDER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{numberOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (NUMBER_ORDER ='' OR NUMBER_ORDER IS NULL)
AND NUMBER_ORDER !=''
AND ORDER_DETAILS LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderDetails,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (ORDER_DETAILS ='' OR ORDER_DETAILS IS NULL)
AND ORDER_DETAILS !=''
AND DESIGN_CHART LIKE CONCAT('%',#{designChart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (DESIGN_CHART ='' OR DESIGN_CHART IS NULL)
AND DESIGN_CHART !=''
AND CRAFTS_ORDER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{wave,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (CRAFTS_ORDER ='' OR CRAFTS_ORDER IS NULL)
AND CRAFTS_ORDER !=''
AND SIZE_CHART LIKE CONCAT('%',#{sizeChart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (SIZE_CHART ='' OR SIZE_CHART IS NULL)
AND WAVE !=''
AND EDITION_TYPE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{editionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (EDITION_TYPE ='' OR EDITION_TYPE IS NULL)
AND EDITION_TYPE !=''
AND CODE59 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{code59,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (CODE59 ='' OR CODE59 IS NULL)
AND CODE59 !=''
AND CODE66 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{code66,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (CODE66 ='' OR CODE66 IS NULL)
AND CODE66 !=''
AND CODE73 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{code73,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (CODE73 ='' OR CODE73 IS NULL)
AND CODE73 !=''
AND CODE80 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{code80,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (CODE80 ='' OR CODE80 IS NULL)
AND CODE80 !=''
AND CODE90 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{code90,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (CODE90 ='' OR CODE90 IS NULL)
AND CODE90 !=''
AND PACKING_BAG_QUANTITY LIKE CONCAT('%',#{packingBagQuantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND ( PACKING_BAG_QUANTITY ='' OR PACKING_BAG_QUANTITY IS NULL)
AND PACKING_BAG_QUANTITY !=''
AND PACKING_BAG_SPECIFICATION LIKE CONCAT('%',#{packingBagSpecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND ( PACKING_BAG_SPECIFICATION ='' OR PACKING_BAG_SPECIFICATION IS NULL)
AND PACKING_BAG_SPECIFICATION !=''
AND INGREDIENT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{ingredient,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (INGREDIENT ='' OR INGREDIENT IS NULL)
AND INGREDIENT !=''
AND POPPER_COLOR LIKE CONCAT('%',#{popperColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (POPPER_COLOR ='' OR POPPER_COLOR IS NULL)
AND POPPER_COLOR !=''
AND POPPER_QUANTITY LIKE CONCAT('%',#{popperQuantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (POPPER_QUANTITY ='' OR POPPER_QUANTITY IS NULL)
AND POPPER_QUANTITY !=''
AND ACCESSORIES_A LIKE CONCAT('%',#{accessoriesA,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (ACCESSORIES_A ='' OR ACCESSORIES_A IS NULL)
AND ACCESSORIES_A !=''
AND ACCESSORIES_A_QUANTITY LIKE CONCAT('%',#{accessoriesAQuantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (ACCESSORIES_A_QUANTITY ='' OR ACCESSORIES_A_QUANTITY IS NULL)
AND ACCESSORIES_A_QUANTITY !=''
AND ACCESSORIES_B LIKE CONCAT('%',#{accessoriesB,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (ACCESSORIES_B ='' OR ACCESSORIES_B IS NULL)
AND ACCESSORIES_B !=''
AND ACCESSORIES_B_QUANTITY LIKE CONCAT('%',#{accessoriesBQuantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (ACCESSORIES_B_QUANTITY ='' OR ACCESSORIES_B_QUANTITY IS NULL)
AND ACCESSORIES_B_QUANTITY !=''
AND ACCESSORIES_C LIKE CONCAT('%',#{accessoriesC,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (ACCESSORIES_C ='' OR ACCESSORIES_C IS NULL)
AND ACCESSORIES_C !=''
AND ACCESSORIES_C_QUANTITY LIKE CONCAT('%',#{accessoriesCQuantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (ACCESSORIES_C_QUANTITY ='' OR ACCESSORIES_C_QUANTITY IS NULL)
AND ACCESSORIES_C_QUANTITY !=''
AND REMARKS_RICHARD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{remarksRichard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (REMARKS_RICHARD ='' OR REMARKS_RICHARD IS NULL)
AND REMARKS_RICHARD !=''
AND REMARKS LIKE CONCAT('%',#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (REMARKS ='' OR REMARKS IS NULL)
AND REMARKS !=''
AND ISSUED_STATUS LIKE CONCAT('%',#{issuedStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (ISSUED_STATUS ='' OR ISSUED_STATUS IS NULL)
AND ISSUED_STATUS !=''
AND FOUNDER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{founder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (FOUNDER ='' OR FOUNDER IS NULL)
AND FOUNDER !=''
ORDER BY FIELD(ISSUED_STATUS,'已发放','理单完成','未理单','配包完成','被退回') DESC,CROP_DATE DESC,CREATED_TIME DESC LIMIT #{pageNow},#{pageSize}

update accessory_material
ADD_DATE = #{addDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAVE = #{wave,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NUMBER_ORDER = #{numberOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ORDER_DETAILS = #{orderDetails,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CROP_DETAILS = #{cropDetails,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CROP_NUMBER = #{cropNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DESIGN_CHART = #{designChart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRAFTS_ORDER = #{craftsOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIZE_CHART = #{sizeChart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EDITION_TYPE = #{editionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE52 = #{code52,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CODE59 = #{code59,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CODE66 = #{code66,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CODE73 = #{code73,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CODE80 = #{code80,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CODE90 = #{code90,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TOTAL_CODE = #{totalCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{tagLoss,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
PACKING_BAG_QUANTITY = #{packingBagQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LOSS = #{loss,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
PACKING_BAG_SPECIFICATION = #{packingBagSpecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INGREDIENT = #{ingredient,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POPPER_COLOR = #{popperColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POPPER_QUANTITY = #{popperQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
POPPER_SINGLE_USE = #{popperSingleUse,jdbcType=INTEGER},
POPPER_ACTUAL_CONSUMPTION = #{popperActualConsumption,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ACCESSORIES_A = #{accessoriesA,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCESSORIES_A_QUANTITY = #{accessoriesAQuantity,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
ACCESSORIES_A_SINGLE_USE = #{accessoriesASingleUse,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
ACCESSORIES_A_ACTUAL_CONSUMPTION = #{accessoriesAActualConsumption,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ACCESSORIES_B = #{accessoriesB,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCESSORIES_B_QUANTITY = #{accessoriesBQuantity,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
ACCESSORIES_B_SINGLE_USE = #{accessoriesBSingleUse,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
ACCESSORIES_B_ACTUAL_CONSUMPTION = #{accessoriesBActualConsumption,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ACCESSORIES_C = #{accessoriesC,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCESSORIES_C_QUANTITY = #{accessoriesCQuantity,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
ACCESSORIES_C_SINGLE_USE = #{accessoriesCSingleUse,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
ACCESSORIES_C_ACTUAL_CONSUMPTION = #{accessoriesCActualConsumption,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REMARKS_RICHARD = #{remarksRichard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISSUED_STATUS = #{issuedStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MARK_STATUS = #{markStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_TIME = #{createdTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FOUNDER = #{founder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETE_TIME = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATOR = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATOR_IP = #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
